# MorbiditySpainR <span style="font-size: 50%;">(on GitHub)</span>

.pull-left[
### Authors

- **Rafael Menéndez**

### Key features

- Retrieve and process morbidity microdata provided by Spanish statistical agencies.
- Provides functions for basic manipulation (filtering, extract diagnoses, reduce data and compute prevalences).
]

.pull-right[
### Data sources

- [Encuesta de morbilidad hospitalaria](https://www.ine.es/dyngs/INEbase/es/operacion.htm?c=Estadistica_C&cid=1254736176778&menu=resultados&secc=1254736195291&idp=1254735573175) del [Instituto Nacional de Estadística](https://ine.es/) (INE).

### Output formats

- **data.frame**.
]
